column1: AMA: I'm Luke Beard I design at Elepath and I'm building Exposure. Previously I've worked on Buffer Hipstamatic and WillCall.
AMA: I'm Justin Edmund the first product design hire at Pinterest.
AMA: I'm Wilson Miner I'm a designer at The Factory in San Francisco. Previously I've worked on Facebook Rdio EveryBlock and apple.com.

AMA: I'm Cameron Moll I founded AuthenticJobs.com and I also re-imagine buildings in type. Previously I've worked as a freelance designer at LDS Church headquarters and survived the dotcom heyday of the late 90's.
AMA: I'm Zac Brown you've never heard of me or seen any of my work. I'm a marketer programmer and designer. Ask me anything :-)
AMA: Founder/Builder of Minimalytics and HookFeed
